magic paths [mpath]: W1 H2 U1 R9
item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
In Thrymsheim lives the last descendants of the Niefel Giants. While most serve as Tjatse's hirdmen, the most influential of them have become Godar over the lesser Jotuns. Thrymsgodar are innately skilled in the magic of the Niefel giants, but their skills are limited compared to their ancestors. Thrymsgodar are even more attuned to the cold than their kin.
